rm(list = ls())

## Transposing

<details><summary>Click here to make setup code visible</summary>
```{r include = FALSE}
### Transposing

```
```{r 75-setup-74-transpose-r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

komoot <- readRDS(here("data/komoot.rds"))

komoot_content <-
  komoot %>%
  pull(content)

coordinates <-
  komoot_content %>%
  map(list("features", 1, "geometry", "coordinates"))
```
</details>


```{r include = FALSE}
# Transposing inside out:
```
```{r 75-transposing-inside-out}
coordinates %>%
  transpose()
```


```{r include = FALSE}
# Flatten to simplify structure:
```
```{r 75-flatten-to-simplify-structure}
coordinates_transposed <-
  coordinates %>%
  transpose() %>%
  map(~ flatten_dbl(.))
```
